text: لَقَدِ ٱبۡتَغَوُاْ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ مِن قَبۡلُ وَقَلَّبُواْ لَكَ ٱلۡأُمُورَ حَتَّىٰ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَظَهَرَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَهُمۡ كَٰرِهُونَ
translation: Ni ukuri, indyarya zarashatse kugerageza abemeramana mu kwemera no mu kubaburagiza kuja ku rugamba rwa “Tabuuki” imbere yuko ruba. Ntumwa y’Imana! Zaranaguhindutse akatari gake kugira ngo uneshwe[12], kugeza n’aho intsinzi iturutse ku Mana Allah ishika, maze idini ry’Imana Allah riratsinda. Ziranababazwa n’iyo ntsinzi;
footnotes: [12] Nk’uko vyagenze ku rugamba rwa Uhudi no ku rugamba rwa Khandaqi.
